definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: This is everyone's childhood dream in a game.
sentences.chinese: 這個遊戲讓我們童年的美夢成真了。

sentences.english: So clear and deep are my fancies, of things I wish were true.
sentences.chinese: 那如此清淅且深刻的迷戀，真希望能夠美夢成真。

sentences.english: Tak your passion and mak it com tru.
sentences.chinese: 開釋你的熱情，讓美夢成真。

sentences.english: But I kept writing, and, eventually, my writing dreams came true.
sentences.chinese: 但是我一直堅持創作，最後我的美夢成真了。

sentences.english: Tacopina's very excited. It's a dream come true.
sentences.chinese: 雅科皮納非常興奮，他美夢成真了。

sentences.english: To take a photograph of this type, really it's a dream come true for me.
sentences.chinese: 能拍到這樣的照片，對我來說真的是美夢成真了。

sentences.english: May you live in interesting times, May you find what you are looking for.
sentences.chinese: 願你生活的時代妙趣橫生，願你心中所想能美夢成真。

sentences.english: The Egg of the snowbird is a symbol of the artist's wish that your dreams may come true.
sentences.chinese: 雪鳥蛋是一種象徵，預示着你將美夢成真。

definition: lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
to waste time on worthless activities
to be promoted and gain wealth (idiom)
it's yours exclusively (idiom)/you are the one/only you deserve it/only you can do it
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: Children's Day (June 1st), PRC national holiday for children under 14
